item.title: By: brackishwater
item.dc:creator: brackishwater
item.description:
Gratz on 3 years Foton! This is a definite milestone and one that deserves cake.. or beer. Cake and Beer? Just beer, nm.
I like the new design, its really clean.
item.content:encoded:
Gratz on 3 years Foton! This is a definite milestone and one that deserves cake.. or beer. Cake and Beer? Just beer, nm.

I like the new design, its really clean.

item.title: By: Jim K
item.dc:creator: Jim K
item.description: I fell down this rabbit hole a year ago. Thanks for the entertainment all these months. best damn gamer blog anywhere!
item.content:encoded: I fell down this rabbit hole a year ago. Thanks for the entertainment all these months. best damn gamer blog anywhere!

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
Thanks all. Fixed the links page, archives still screwy.
I took out the red line. It was intended, but didn't work out as a design element. Obviously. :)
item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: Mena
item.dc:creator: Mena
item.description: Grats on your anniversary! The new site looks great. Nice job on the "Foton in Reruns" - thanks Firefly!
item.content:encoded: Grats on your anniversary! The new site looks great. Nice job on the “Foton in Reruns” – thanks Firefly!

item.title: By: Rog

item.description: Gratz, looks good. Nice and clean. =)

item.title: By: Torcie

item.description: Grats on the b'day and I see no red line at all.
item.content:encoded: Grats on the b’day and I see no red line at all.

item.title: By: Tony
item.dc:creator: Tony
item.description:
Grats on the ding. Few blogs have made me actually LOL, so thanks for all the entertainment. Thanks for all the blogging help you provided me personally, as well.
Looking forward to more!
item.content:encoded:
Grats on the ding. Few blogs have made me actually LOL, so thanks for all the entertainment. Thanks for all the blogging help you provided me personally, as well.

Looking forward to more!

item.title: By: Belittle

item.description: Congratulations. I stumbled upon afkgamer.com about 3 months ago and I am very happy that I did.
